text:
Hey serverless users!

We're about to start an exciting new serverless beta that includes the ability to:

- upload `package.json` files to include custom third-party dependencies in your functions
- test your functions with a locally running functions server before pushing them live

If you're interested in participating, please fill out this form: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/private-betas> and check off the `Custom NPM Packages and Local Testing for Serverless Functions (CMS Ent. Only)` box. Once you've done that, we will be in touch with some more information on how to get started.

*Note: this beta is only available to developers building functions locally with the CLI tools*
Minor note: Participation in this beta requires that you are using an account that has access to serverless functions. This means either your CMS Sandbox, OR an account with CMS Hub Enterprise.
This is awesome - this along with the changes to rate limits makes this a much more attractive offering!

for those interested, here's the getting started doc for the new serverless features: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRGX60V2wQ2Co9X1NO73hkLObcQdNWp2i49XE-pY_DRS6UjZnv4UuODz4nsI_g1gUIXFC1MhN4AFsnZ/pub>

feel free to look it over and sign up if you want to use this new functionality. it should be noted that if you don't fill out the sign up form you won't have access to these features, since we need to actually enable them in your hub
